ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Learn the powerful tools behind solid state physics, far beyond Kittel and Ashcroft&Mermin.
I would definitely recommend it to anyone who is interested.
I would just suggest taking it if they will do anything related to condensed matter physics, physical chemistry, or simply if they want a different and challenging experience with a class.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: Gained much better understanding of basic theory of solid state physics. Extremely useful course for experimentalists as well as theorists.

It was good to see the theoretical side of physics and to do some elementary calculations from scratch. Although I won't be doing theoretical solid state physics, the methods learned are important for an experimentalist to know.
It taught me the fundamentals of my research area.
It completed many of the holes I had in my previous knowledge of the field and added some.
